item.title: LE HUG (d.v.) for Eric Bompard
item.description:
LE HUG (d.v.) for Eric Bompard

Commercial for Eric Bompard A/W 2012 Agency: Air Paris Creative Director: Tho Van Tran Director: Álvaro de la Herrán Production: Onirim -- The Yeti : Guerassim Dichliev The Lady: Hartje Andersen Producer: Remi Pietka Line Producer: Matthieu Vachon Cinematography: José Luis Salomón Color: Anne Szymkowiak Art Director: Sahara Widoff Yeti Fx: Sylvie Ferry & Pierre Jayne Styling: Stéphanie Brissay Hairdresser: Marc Orsatelli Make Up: Maria Olsson Gaffer: John Rosenlund Focus Puller: Hans Bergren

item.title: MINE for GQ Magazine
item.description:
MINE for GQ Magazine

GQ Spain proposed a film to me inspired by the characters of the book that I see in all books shops - Fifty Shades of Grey - but it's clear to me that in a contemporary sexual relationship a kiss hides more than a tongue.
